GK21ttrkhy2u:1: asti dākṣiṇātye janapade mihilāropyaṃ nāma nagaram |

GK21ttrkhy2u:6: evaṃ bhakṣyamāṇe tasmin suprayatnasthāpite 'pi nirviṇṇas sthānāt sthānam uccair matprati bhayāt saṅkramayati |

GK21ttrkhy2u:15: anukūlapratikūlaṃ jāhnavīm anu paryaṭan ! kiṃ bahunā ! kṛtsnaṃ mahīmaṇḍalaṃ samudraparyantam avalokitavān |

GK21ttrkhy2u:307: evaṃ cintayan prabhātāyāṃ rātryāṃ bhūyo 'pi nagaram āsādya vittopārjanāya cittam āsthāya katipayakālena pañcāśad dīnārān
GK21ttrkhy2u:308: upārjya punas svadeśagamanāya tenaiva mārgeṇa pravartitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:310: tatraiva nīyate ! yāvad astaṃ gacchati bhānau tam eva nyagrodham āsāditavān ! acintayac ca
GK21ttrkhy2u:313: punas sa eva nyagrodharūpī rākṣasa āpatita iti |
GK21ttrkhy2u:314: evaṃ cintayan svapnāyamānaḥ paśyati sma dvāvetau puruṣau |
GK21ttrkhy2u:316: bho vaṅkāla ! somilakasya pañcāśad dīnārā vartante |
GK21ttrkhy2u:320: somilakas tu pratibuddho nādrākṣīd dhṛtān iti |
GK21ttrkhy2u:323: ko 'yaṃ vṛttāntaḥ ! kena vā kāraṇena mama kleśārjitavittam apaharatīti na vijānāmi |
GK21ttrkhy2u:325: evaṃ cintayan nirāhāras tatra eva tasthau ! yāvat katipayair evāhobhir
GK21ttrkhy2u:331: [ yad abhāvi na tad bhāvi bhāvi yat tad ananyathā |
GK21ttrkhy2u:332: iti cintāviṣaghno 'yam agadaḥ kiṃ na pīyate || 113 ||
GK21ttrkhy2u:333: śayāna ākasmikam aśnute phalaṃ kṛtaprayatno 'py aparo 'vasīdati |
GK21ttrkhy2u:334: asaṃyamān nṛtyati kevalaṃ jano vidhis tu yatrecchati tatra sampadaḥ || 114 ||
GK21ttrkhy2u:335: naivākṛtiḥ phalati naiva guṇā na śauryaṃ vidyā na caiva na ca yatnakṛto viśeṣaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:336: bhāgyāni karmaphalasañcayasañcitāni kāle phalanti puruṣasya yathaiva vṛkṣāḥ || 115 ||
GK21ttrkhy2u:337: kruddho 'pi kaḥ kasya karoti duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ ca kaḥ kasya karoti hṛṣṭaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:340: pāṇipādair upetāś ca pareṣāṃ bhṛtyatāṃ gatāḥ || 117 || ]
GK21ttrkhy2u:342: pānabhojanād ṛte tava vittopārjanaṃ na kiñcid asti |
GK21ttrkhy2u:343: [ vahanti śivikām anye santy anye śivikāṃ gatāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:344: akāraṇaṃ hi vaktṛtvaṃ vyutthānaṃ kevalaṃ jarā || 118 ||
GK21ttrkhy2u:346: avaśyaṃ labhate jantur atra kā paridevanā || 119 ||
GK21ttrkhy2u:347: labdhavyāny eva labhate gantavyāny eva gacchati |
GK21ttrkhy2u:348: prāptavyāny eva cāpnoti duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca || 120 ||
GK21ttrkhy2u:350: sukhāny api tathā manye daivam atrātiricyate || 121 ||
GK21ttrkhy2u:351: tat ko viśeṣayati kena kṛto viśiṣṭaḥ ko vā dhanais saha vijāyati ko daridraḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:352: bhāgyāni ṣaṭpada iva sthiracañcalāni nityaṃ manuṣyakusumeṣu paribhramanti || 122 || ]
GK21ttrkhy2u:353: tathāpi daivapuruṣayogād arthotpattiḥ ! puruṣaś carati ! daivaṃ phalatīti |
GK21ttrkhy2u:362: gaccha ! asminn evādhiṣṭhāne dvau vaṇijakau paśya |
GK21ttrkhy2u:364: tau dṛṣṭvā yādṛk tayor abhivāñchasīti ! tādṛg bhaviṣyasi |
GK21ttrkhy2u:366: somilako 'pi prabhāte tan nagaraṃ upaviśya sārthavāhaṃ dhanaguptam āsasāda |
GK21ttrkhy2u:369: so 'pi vaṇik sandhyām ativāhya niśāmukhe kiñcitmātram aśanam
GK21ttrkhy2u:372: athāsau kaulikaḥ kuśān āstīrya bhūmau nipatya supto 'paśyat tāv eva dvau puruṣau |
GK21ttrkhy2u:377: nāsya sthāpanād ṛte dāne bhojane vā kiñcid vihitam |
GK21ttrkhy2u:385: tato dvitīyaṃ taṃ vyayaśīlaṃ bhogavarmāṇam uddiśya somilako gataḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:386: tenāsau mahatā bhojanapānādinā satkṛtas somilakas tathaiva mahati śayane sopacāre svāstīrṇe niśāyāṃ supto 'paśyat tāv eva puruṣau |
GK21ttrkhy2u:388: bhadra vaṅkāla ! śobhanam anuṣṭhitaṃ bhogavarmaṇā prāhuṇakaṃ somilakaṃ sammānayatā |
GK21ttrkhy2u:397: asti ! ahaṃ kadācid yamunākacche śāligrāmamadhye priyakamṛgyām utpannaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:400: camūraḥ kadalī kandalī priyaka eṇaka ete mṛgayonayas stutāḥ pañca eva |
GK21ttrkhy2u:405: tathā sati me mātā yadā gatā ! tadāhaṃ lubdhakaiḥ potaka eva gṛhitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:406: strīkṣīreṇa vivardhitoyāvat tadgṛhe nivasāmi ! tāvan me mātā
GK21ttrkhy2u:410: aham aputravatī kva me putra iti |
GK21ttrkhy2u:413: nijakṛtrimayos sahāyayor nijas sahāyo garīyān iti |
GK21ttrkhy2u:415: atha lubdhakasakāśād āgata iti bhayacakitadṛśaṃ mātaraṃ prāptaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:421: asmākaṃ dve gatī ! ūrdhvā ! āñjasī ca |
GK21ttrkhy2u:422: tayor mātṛkapayovirahād aham āñjasīṃ vedmi ! nordhvam |
GK21ttrkhy2u:424: āvignahṛdayaś ca kva te gatā iti vilokitavān |
GK21ttrkhy2u:425: paśyāmi tān ūrdhvagatyabhijñatayā jālaṃ vilaṅghyāgrato gatān |
GK21ttrkhy2u:428: kāryakāle tu samprāpte nāvajñeyaṃ trayaṃ sadā |
GK21ttrkhy2u:429: bījam auṣadham āhāro yathā lābhas tathākrayaḥ || 149 ||
GK21ttrkhy2u:431: tataś ca vyādhair durātmabhir jīvagrāhaṃ gṛhītvā krīḍārthaṃ rājaputrāyopanītaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:432: so 'pi māṃ dṛṣṭvātīva parituṣṭo vyādhān prādeśikena sammānitavān |
GK21ttrkhy2u:435: sair bhojanaprakāraiś cāsambhāvyais snigdhadravapeśalais sakhaṇḍaguḍadāḍimacāturjātakavimiśrair anyaiś ca bhojyair atarpayat |
GK21ttrkhy2u:436: athāntaḥpurikājanasya rājakumārāṇāṃ ca hastād dhastaṃ ca kautukaparatayā grīvānayanakaracaraṇakarṇāvakarṣaṇaiḥ parasparerṣyābhī rājāṅganābhis sammānaparamparatayā kleśito aham |
GK21ttrkhy2u:441: nivṛttakautukānāṃ ca kadācid vivikte vartamāne rājaputraśayanādhastān mayā prāvṛṭsamaye meghaśabdaśravaṇotkaṇṭhitahṛdayena svayūthacyutena svayūthyān anusmṛtyābhihitam |
GK21ttrkhy2u:443: pṛṣṭhato yad gamiṣyāmi kadā tan me bhaviṣyati || 150 ||
GK21ttrkhy2u:444: evam uccārayato rājaputreṇa bālabhāvād abhāvitacittenaitāvac chrutvā santrastena dvāsstho 'bhihitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:447: ahaṃ ca lubdhakair mānuṣīṃ vācaṃ śikṣita āsam |
GK21ttrkhy2u:448: dṛṣṭvā ca māṃ mānuṣeṇevānena mṛgenābhihitam ! vinaṣṭo 'smīti
GK21ttrkhy2u:450: atha kathañcid viskhalitavāg asau bahir niścakrāma |
GK21ttrkhy2u:452: tatas sarvābhiṣagbhūtatantrikān mahatyā arthamātrayā jvaraparītaḥ prārthitavān ! evaṃ cābravīt
GK21ttrkhy2u:453: yo mamaitāṃ rujam apanayati ! tasyāham akṛśāṃ pūjāṃ
GK21ttrkhy2u:455: aham api tatrāsamīkṣitakāriṇā janena laguḍeṣṭakādibhir druhyamāṇaḥ kenāpi sādhunāvacchannaḥ
GK21ttrkhy2u:457: atha mamāyuśśeṣatayā tenāryeṇa sarvalakṣaṇavidā vijñāpito rājaputraḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:460: priyako nāmaiṣa mṛgo mānuṣīṃ vācaṃ jānāti |
GK21ttrkhy2u:465: prāyeṇa pakṣiṇaḥ paśavaś ca bhayāhāramaithunamātravedino bhavanti ! ity adhigatam eva devena
GK21ttrkhy2u:469: yādṛg icchec ca bhavituṃ tādṛg bhavati pūruṣaḥ || 151 ||
GK21ttrkhy2u:470: hīyate hi naras tāta hīnais saha samāgamāt |
GK21ttrkhy2u:471: samaiś ca samatām eti viśiṣṭaiś ca viśiṣṭatām || 152 || ]
GK21ttrkhy2u:472: tat ! deva ! manuṣyasamparkāt priyakajātivaśāc ca mānuṣīṃ vācaṃ dadātīti sammānitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:478: [ mantrāṇāṃ parato nāsti bījam uccaraṇaṃ tathā |
GK21ttrkhy2u:481: [ śaṅkhaḥ kadalyāṃ kadalī ca bheryāṃ tasyāṃ ca bheryāṃ sumahad vimānam |
GK21ttrkhy2u:483: tat kva śaṅkaḥ ! kva kadalī ! kva bherī ! kva vimānam iti |
GK21ttrkhy2u:485: tac ca śrutvāpagatavikāro rājaputraḥ pūrvaprakṛtim āpannaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy2u:486: vicārya tasyāryasya prajñāvibhavaṃ tato mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā mantrisamīpavartī mantritve kṛtaḥ
GK21ttrkhy2u:487: māṃ cāpanīyābhyajya prabhūtenāmbhasā prakṣālitaśarīraṃ kṛtvārakṣipuruṣādhiṣṭhitaṃ tatraiva vane pratimuktavān |
GK21ttrkhy2u:488: tat kiṃ bahunā ! anubhūtabandhano 'py ahaṃ niyativaśāt punar
